data.title: Petition Â· Stop Victor Salva from entering Canada
data.meta_description: I am starting a petition to stop film director Victor Salva from entering Canada! Salva was convicted of sexual misconduct with a 12-year-old boy, who was one of the stars of his movie Clownhouse. He also videotaped one of the encounters. This man should not be granted access to Canada and I am absolutely disgusted that he's coming to BC let's try and stop this scum bag!
data.text: I am starting a petition to stop film director Victor Salva from entering Canada! Salva was convicted of sexual misconduct with a 12-year-old boy, who was one of the stars of his movie Clownhouse. He also videotaped one of the encounters. This man should not be granted access to Canada and I am absolutely disgusted that he's coming to BC let's try and stop this scum bag!
